author: LethiferousMoose
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
Define a region atop a function with comment help with no new line between the region tag and the comment header.

```powershell
#region TestRegion
<#
.SYNOPSIS
Test synopsis

.DESCRIPTION
Test description

.EXAMPLE
Test example

.NOTES
Test notes
#>
function TestFunc {
    param()

}
#endregion
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
The comment based help displays correctly when Get-Help is called from PowerShell.
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
The generated help is displayed when Get-Help is called from PowerShell.
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta.9
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.9
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.15063
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: Region tags break comment help
